definition: to be fascinated/to be rapt/to long for/to dream of
God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person/to long for/infatuated/fascinated
thoughts wandering far away

sentences.english: After seeing the film the heroine in it swept Peter off his feet.
sentences.chinese: 看完電影之後，電影中的女主角讓彼得心馳神往。

sentences.english: Perhaps this is the reason of height often firing one's imagination?
sentences.chinese: 或許這就是高度總是令人神往的原因？

sentences.english: Its fragrant scent will give you unlimited imagination.
sentences.chinese: 她將賦予您馥郁的芬芳令人悠然上神往。

sentences.english: And that future is very exciting," he added.
sentences.chinese: 這一未來令人心馳神往，”他補充道。

sentences.english: Just one sight of the photo can make anyone have a deep longing for the beautiful landscape.
sentences.chinese: 只要瞧一下這幀作品，便令人心馳神往。

sentences.english: Under the Best Solar viewers, especially the color natural happiness, also can not help but fascinating study.
sentences.chinese: 即百世之下觀者，尤將色然喜，不禁而神往學也。

sentences.english: To enable all students to mind is fascinated Tour in school, of course, including me.
sentences.chinese: 是令所有學生心是神馳神往的學校，當然也包括我。

sentences.english: The showy world in which her interest lay completely absorbed her.
sentences.chinese: 她所神往的這個花花世界完全把她吸引住了。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the brilliant local Zhuang ethnic-group culture and the picturesque landscape of Guilin appeal deeply to the tourists.
sentences.chinese: 此外，燦爛的壯族文化和秀麗的桂林山水也令人神往。

sentences.english: You have found a soul place.
sentences.chinese: 你找到了你心儀神往的地方，這就是你靈魂的歸屬地。

sentences.english: It is desirquhasified for sign up with good schools.
sentences.chinese: 請求好學校是令人神往的。

sentences.english: He dreamt a dream of swimming up to see the sky above.
sentences.chinese: 她夢到自己游上海面，可以仰望心馳神往的漫漫天際。

sentences.english: Xinjiang fascinates people from all over China and the world.
sentences.chinese: 新疆讓中國以至全世界的人民神往。

sentences.english: The world is full of fascinating places.
sentences.chinese: 世界上令人神往的地方比比皆是。

sentences.english: It is desircapable to implement to good schools.
sentences.chinese: 申請好學校是令人神往的。
那是一種令人神往的情形。
